title: Data Leakage in Machine Learning
description: In this article, you will learn what data leakage is and how to avoid it. If you don’t know how to prevent it, leaks will frequently occur and ruin your models in subtle and dangerous ways. It is, therefore, one of the most important concepts for all machine learning practitioners.
description_lemmatized: article learn data leakage avoid dont know prevent leak frequently occur ruin model subtle dangerous way therefore one important concept machine learning practitioner
